caption:
This photograph features a middle-aged man standing outdoors. He has a stern expression with his arms crossed in front of him. The man is well-dressed in a brown suit paired with a blue and brown striped tie. His hair is neatly combed back, showing signs of graying.

In the background, there's a simple, modern building, possibly an office or institutional structure with visible windows and a part of another similar building adjacent to it. The sky is clear and blue, suggesting it might be a sunny day.

Overall, the setting appears to be a business or corporate environment, and the man's serious demeanor and professional attire seem to underscore a formal or authoritative role or situation.
title: Dr. Melvin Carter, director of EPA's National Research Center at Las Vegas
